code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getContacts}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactList=()=>{const[contacts,setContacts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchContacts=async()=>{try{const response=await getContacts();setContacts(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching contacts:',error);}};fetchContacts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Contacts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:contacts.map(contact=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:contact.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Email: ",contact.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Phone: ",contact.phone]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Subject: ",contact.subject]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Message: ",contact.message]})]},contact._id))})]});};export default ContactList;
